install.name: eshop_ups
install.title: UPS
install.author: Giang Dinh Truong
install.description: This is UPS Shipping method for Eshop

field.name: package_fee
field.label: Package fee
field.description: This is fee for package

field.name: ups_key
field.label: * Access Key
field.description: Enter the XML rates access key assigned to you by UPS.

field.name: ups_username
field.label: * Username
field.description: Enter your UPS Services account username.

field.name: ups_password
field.label: * Password
field.description: Enter your UPS Services account password.

field.name: ups_pickup
field.label: Pickup Method
field.description: How do you give packages to UPS (only used when origin is US)?

field.name: ups_packaging
field.label: Packaging Type
field.description: What kind of packaging do you use?

field.name: ups_classification
field.label: Customer Classification Code
field.description: 01 - If you are billing to a UPS account and have a daily UPS pickup, 03 - If you do not have a UPS account or you are billing to a UPS account but do not have a daily pickup, 04 - If you are shipping from a retail outlet (only used when origin is US)

field.name: ups_origin
field.label: Shipping Origin Code
field.description: What origin point should be used (this setting affects only what UPS product names are shown to the user)

field.name: ups_city
field.label: * Origin City
field.description: Enter the name of the origin city

field.name: ups_state
field.label: * Origin State/Province
field.description: Enter the two-letter code for your origin state/province

field.name: ups_country
field.label: * Origin Country
field.description: Enter the two-letter code for your origin country

field.name: ups_postcode
field.label: Origin Zip/Postal Code
field.description: Enter your origin zip/postalcode

field.name: ups_test
field.label: Test Mode
field.description: Use this shipping method in Test (YES) or Production mode (NO)?

field.name: ups_quote_type
field.label: Quote Type
field.description: Quote for Residential or Commercial Delivery

field.name: ups_us
field.label: US Origin Services
field.description: Select the UPS US Origin services to be offered.
field.option: UPS Next Day Air Early A.M.

field.name: ups_ca
field.label: Canada Origin Services
field.description: Select the UPS Canada Origin services to be offered.

field.name: ups_eu
field.label: European Union Origin Services
field.description: Select the UPS European Union Origin services to be offered.

field.name: ups_pr
field.label: Puerto Rico Origin Services
field.description: Select the UPS Puerto Rico Origin services to be offered.
field.option: UPS Next Day Air Early A.M.

field.name: ups_mx
field.label: Mexico Origin Services
field.description: Select the UPS Mexico Origin services to be offered.

field.name: ups_other
field.label: All Other Origins Services
field.description: Select the UPS All Other Origins services to be offered.

field.name: ups_insurance
field.label: Enable Insurance
field.description: Enables insurance with product total as the value

field.name: ups_display_weight
field.label: Display Delivery Weight
field.description: Do you want to display the shipping weight? (e.g. Delivery Weight : 2.7674 Kg's)
